ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data

Class OfflineIOHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data.OfflineIOHelper

  • public class OfflineIOHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Will Handle loading and saving of our offline(cached) stories from local storage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OfflineIOHelper

        public OfflineIOHelper(android.content.Context context)
        Sole constructor for the OfflineIOHelper class. Loads in context from the calling application that is used for the FileInputStream and FileOuputStreams.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to load.
